title: Grand Slam - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Second Chance
author: Ja Miso   자미소
description:
The tennis genius who had everything, Young Suk.

However, even he had one thing he lacked.

What he lacked were the legs to walk on the court.

“I… went back to the past?”

The legendary wheelchaired tennis player.

Moving his own legs and not wheels, he aims for the Grand Slam!!!>
